text: AP Clint Eastwood has finally spoken out about the bizarre and controversial speech he gave at the Republic National Convention last week. ( I loved the speech. Just about everyone else I know hated it. ) Anyway, Eastwood has given an extensive interview about the speech to the newspaper of the tiny California town he used to be the mayor of, Carmel. Among other things, Eastwood told the Carmel Pine Cone :'' President Obama is the greatest hoax ever perpetrated on the American people.'' Them's fighting words. ( Not to be annoying, but if you're going to say something like that, it seems as though you ought to back it up a bit. Eastwood didn't, at least not in the Carmel Pine Cone ).
